title: Support ticket
body: How the fuck do you get support tickets for reporting a player these days? I'm chat restricted for telling my useless %%%% team that they're just that yet some %%%got gets to flame me all game for leashing the jungler after he was invaded. Riot are too thick to set their shit up properly i assume. you go request a ticket fill out their useless as fuck sheet then get offered "links" to more useless shit. the useless %%%%s wonder why people are so toxic? get promoted, put with trash. flamed by said trash. restricted for reacting to said trash. decide to report said trash rather than reacting. can't. sort your shit out.  i'm not a bad player, generally go positive and have a positive w/l ratio and i can't climb because this games flawed as fuck. beyond pathetic.

replies.body:
Fun Fact: Breaking the rules results in getting hit with punishments! That means for you too!

Point being, if you break the rules you'll get punished, just like everyone else (and yes, that includes the toxic player you're complaining about now).

That's not what i asked, Like i said to the guy above you fucking idiot, WHY CAN'T I SEND IN A TICKET? the report system does not work. it's as simple as that, you can claim it does. but i see the same people day in day out not banned let alone chat restricted. the system is a hit and miss, it hits 1 out of every 1000 fucking cases thrown at it

I have watched several of my team report a toxic player (ie yourself) and a little message pops up saying "Due to recent reports and feedback a player has received punishment"

In the last week this message has popped up 12-15 times

Keep blaming your team buddy and you will never climb. Soon you will realize it's all about you and not your team mate. The chances of you meeting the same team mate again is very unlikely so you better start trying to improve yourself or you will always remain at the elo you at. Here is the link for the support ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new 

If it does not work then it's probably because of your chat restriction. By the looks of this post, it looks like you deserve it.
You stomp your lane > You get fed > You gank other lanes > They win their lane > when you teamfight you are strong asf> Easy objectives > Ez game

And the chances of you getting a troll in a game is unlikely. However, when you get a troll, all you have to do is hard carry. Just like the last I had, heimer was trolling and refused to listen. Since we had a nasus, I went to his lane and made his laner low so he gets the last hit, I also made sure I was drawing pressure towards my lane so that jungler, bot lane/top lane was forced to go to my lane to defend and giving my laners more time to farm and take more objectives. Since we got the nasus fed, we grouped mid to draw pressure while nasus split top and eventually we won the game with a TROLL. You will never climb when you always make excuses.
You are so dense and you will never ever climb lol. Keep blaming team buddy and stay bronze :))

Seriously, OCE is just inhabited by utterly useless players. Like, wow, there is zero semblance of any structured game-play. Just wank around, don't close out games, leave open inhibs, 1v5. Garbage.

I agree and disagree, i never mute players. it's not that i can't handle the abuse, i rarely reply to it but it keeps me entertained, it's when 2 or mroe people go at it, or when you get flamed for no reason and then because the kid reports you out of spite your restricted, AND THEN BECAUSE YOU'RE FUCKING RESTRICTED when you try typing next fucking game either to say "mid blue" or "jg is bot side" or even "goodjob bro" it turns into fucking abuse because riots shitty system frustrates me to the point i end up telling people to fuck off rather than explaining the situation. a simple "sorry red buff ksed" turns into "fuck up you useless %%%%" because whoever i just ksed by accident has abused me for 4 minutes straight. there is no such thing as a KS in my opinion but unfortnately i seem to be the only one.
